reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative:
This Activity will support public financial management through two modalities:
  • Budget support assistance as informed and assessed through MFAT’s membership in the Core Economic Working Group.
  • Recruitment and provision of a NZ senior accountant to fulfil the Solomon Islands Accountant General role (which sits within the Ministry of Finance and Treasury).
